application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - London plane: Crown reduce back to previous, most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth.T2 - London Plane: Crown reduce back to previous, most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth.T4 - Silver Birch: Prune in overlong branches shape to balance. Crown clean.T5 - Cherry: Crown reduce back to previous most recent reduction points. Crown clean.T6 - Sycamore: Crown reduce back to previous, most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth. Crown clean.T7 - London plane: Crown reduce back to previous, most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth.T8 - London plane: Crown reduce back to previous, most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth.T9 - Lime: Crown reduce back to previous, most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth. Crown clean.T10 - Sycamore: Crown reduce back to previous most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth. Crown clean.T11 - Lime: Crown reduce back to previous, most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth. Crown clean.T12 - London plane: Crown reduce back to previous most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth.G13 Sycamore, Mixed: Crown lift trees above public footpath by up to 3 metres and prune branches back to boundary
decision_conditions: work in accordance with British Standard
